review: Constant trouble with getting Fire Stick to connect to Wifi. Drops connection even with great Wifi signal and while sitting right next to router. I would not recommend this product.
author: Brandon Wright

review: I've had it for a week and still have not been able to figure out how to sign into my Netflix account.  It won't let me go past signing into Amazon.  UPDATE: ok, I got smart and googled it, and have all apps installed.  Must say, the brief instructions were not specific to all circumstances.  I still don't know why I have to get out original tv remote to go to source/input, but I can deal with that.  Like it alot.
author: Pat D.

review: I got the Fire TV Stick free when I signed up for Sling TV. It works great, easy installation, easy setup and online in a few minutes. I haven't explored all the options it offers yet but I will soon. The remote control is nice and easy to use as well. I recommend it.
author: Margaret Goodwin

review: My Smart tv is slower than Molasses in winter! This works smarter and faster than smart for dummies! One of my favorite upgrades! Recommend for anyone that has a need for speed.

Very frustrating.
